title: PBE Signups.

embed.description: Hey fam, Update 4/8/2017 - 7:00AM PBE Signups are Closed until further notice: Hello Summoners, PBE signups are closed until further notice. The website has been in a poorly functioning state for a while now and we are trying to address all the problems at once instead of throwing

body: The signups for PBE accounts have been down for several months, and we haven't gotten any updates in that time. Frankly, I'm beginning to worry. Has this issue been forgotten?

replies.body: The [PBE status page ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)still stays up to date in real-time, and will continue to have info on the PBE as it goes through maintenance.   I don't have any additional info on the PBE site, but bookmarking the PBE status page would be your best bet.  I know it's been a while, but I'm sure it will be worth the wait!
